title: Ah, Dangerous Dave
content:
Happy Keen day everyone!

Ah, but its Mort day where I am... [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img]

Well, someone just a bit back wanted this, so here are all the graphics from Dangerous Dave in the Haunted Mansion, extracted by me and my brother in Keen 1-3 format [Yes, you can use ModKeen 1.0 to convert these into a .CKx file [It won't work in Keen though]

[url=http://levellord.toxicsheep.com/dd2g.zip]levellord.toxicsheep.com/dd2g.zip[/url]

[PS, Grafix, toxicsheep.com is stll fucked up]

Oh, and here's something else too; a small fiddling with the origional Dangerous Dave complete with a short story, new level and level editor [It doesn't handle extra tiles well, I guess we'll have to wait until someone more talented then me makes a Dave editor, hint hint.]

[url=http://levellord.toxicsheep.com/HAUNTED.zip]levellord.toxicsheep.com/HAUNTED.zip[/url]


Happy Mort day, and rot in hell! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img]

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Hmm.
content:
Heh, interesting. I screwed it up by constantly running in and out of the door to the top right of the start area... I got spasmed through a building from the top right and came out the bottom left near that boss dude. Oops.

[hr]Levellord [It doesn't handle extra tiles well, I guess we'll have to wait until someone more talented then me makes a Dave editor, hint hint.]
[hr]It's getting there... Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A concerned member of the Preservation of Endangered Spleens Society

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: Hmm.
content:
Dangerous Dave 2, that's awesome.
Some time ago I tried blasting through levels as fast as possible. I managed to get through first two levels quite nicely. Check videos:
[url=http://files.filefront.com/Dave2HQL1002165avi/;4640220;;/fileinfo.html]files.filefront.com/Dave2...einfo.html[/url] // Level 1,
[url=http://files.filefront.com/Dave2HQL2002665avi/;4640239;;/fileinfo.html]files.filefront.com/Dave2...einfo.html[/url] // Level 2
Level 3, though, was a lot harder, I managed to blast to the bottom of the level by shooting only 4 bullets on my way. Then it got harder and I had to shoot almost everyone on sight. I found out how to jump quickly up the stairs without getting mashed by a ghoul but I still got whacked at the top. Levels 4 and further were rather hard and I didn't try them yet.
Great game.

title: Re: Hmm.
content:
You really are Mr Speedy aren't you? I think we shall get along fine. You can get throgh my level in less than 4 miniutes. A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

title: DD is a penguin of something
content:
Hmmm, did I try this mod, or didn't I?
I tried a mod, I know that much.
I barely even played the original DD, died really quickly and didn't feel like dying, so quit. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

Maybe I should start a new thread for this, since it's not exactly related, but... it's only a small thing.
The title of the thread doesn't give any specifics about the topic, so that's my excuse.
Consider it a bump.
(Did you want a bump?)

So, anyway, I wasn't even looking for it, but I accidently found this:
[url=http://www.thatvideogamesite.com/play.php?id=383]Hit biked DD like a penguin or something game[/url]Retodon8
Sheep happens! [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Keen/Graphics/K1_nme_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]
